name: ai-experiment-logger
description: Track and analyze AI experiments with MCP tools and web dashboard. Log prompts, results, and ratings across different AI tools, with comprehensive statistics and CSV export.
features: Beautiful web dashboard with Tailwind CSS

tools.name: log_experiment
tools.description: Create a new experiment entry with tool, prompt, result, and rating

tools.name: list_experiments
tools.description: List all experiments with optional filtering and search

tools.name: get_experiment
tools.description: Retrieve a specific experiment by ID

tools.name: delete_experiment
tools.description: Remove an experiment from the log

tools.name: get_statistics
tools.description: Generate comprehensive analytics and performance metrics

tools.name: export_experiments
tools.description: Export all data to CSV format

usage.mcp: Use MCP tools like log_experiment, list_experiments, get_statistics in Stoked Automations
usage.web: Run 'npm run web' to start web dashboard at http://localhost:3000

examples.title: Log an AI experiment
examples.description: Track a code generation experiment with ChatGPT
examples.code:
log_experiment:
  aiTool: ChatGPT o1-preview
  prompt: Write a Python function to calculate Fibonacci
  result: Clean recursive implementation with complexity analysis
  rating: 5
  tags: [code-generation, python]

examples.title: Get statistics
examples.description: View which AI tools perform best
examples.code:
get_statistics

Shows:
- Average ratings by tool
- Rating distribution
- Top tags
- Recent activity
